summary: The SEC has filed an emergency lawsuit in federal court in Brooklyn to prevent Reginald Middleton and Veritaseum from spending $8 million from an ICO the
title: SEC files emergency lawsuit against Veritaseum to stop spending millions of dollars in ICO money
content: The complaint alleges that Defendants engaged in securities fraud under the Securities Act and the Exchange Act, the unregistered sale and offer of securities under the Securities act, and market manipulation under the Exchange Act.
At the time of writing, the price of VERI tokens is down more than 60%.
